Recursion Semantics (cont’d)

  • Pro: a simple header states the limit of the action

  • Con: it is very difficult to specify the recursion behavior of all functions

  • Recommended solution: move the specification of the Depth header and recursion semantics to a separate specification

    • allows the main specification to continue without being held back by quibbling over definition of recursion semantics
    • Saveen Reddy, Microsoft, has volunteered to be document editor
